'''Love Is All Around''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to help Zhihua find 5 signs that romance is coming his way in "[[Good Sign]]."

==Gameplay Notes==
The behavior leading to the five signs are the following:
*See that Granny Shan has good business
*Leave the pigeons alone
*Leave the dogs alone
*Leave the cat and fish alone
*Leave the leaves alone
